name: Worlds
description: You're Reyk, a highly trained interdimensional Agent. Pack yourself with deadly weapons and equipment, then journey through the portal to strange parallel worlds! Assassinate your targets, sneak in enemy bases and investigate on mysterious anomalies to uncover the odd link between these worlds...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated chipset Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated chipset Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
